Articles.Content:
Textures of parts are not loading in the editors. I have attempted, repeatedly, re-installing, and not had any success.

Album https://imgur.com/gallery/PjO7NXe will appear when post is submitted

Bad link to the pic.

Usually, if textures aren't loading, they aren't installed properly.  Have you been reinstalling from the same download?  If so, clear out everything, and re-download again, you may just have gotten a wonky download (doubtful.. but....).   But a clean install means that there should be nothing left of the previous version before you install it again, as if it was never on your machine. 

If that doesn't work, post up the KSP.log so we can see whats going on.
I've seen that before too. It might be a graphics card or graphics setting problem, but it would help if you posted KSP.log (like said above)

Ho my god, this [snip] making me crazy do you have this problem ?  I reinstalled, delete everything but the saves come back againagainagain with the problem. been two days haaaa I can't play

https://imgur.com/gallery/5UtOBB0

Edited August 7, 2018 by Snark
Redacted by moderator

2 hours ago, Skullcrash said:

Ho my god, this [snip] making me crazy do you have this problem ?  I reinstalled, delete everything but the saves come back againagainagain with the problem. been two days haaaa I can't play

https://imgur.com/gallery/5UtOBB0

What platform are you playing on and which version? I am probably wrong but this looks like an old version and if you are on Windows it also looks like you are trying to force opengl.

Hi forcing DX11 in KSP1.4.5 also has the same effect ,  as a matter of interest to some,  hangar extender , when extended,  reloads the textures and  they show properly only in the expanded hangar .

Edited August 7, 2018 by SpannerMonkey(smce)
Windows 10, and I tried to change versions and it glitches in 1.4.1 to 1.4.5.
My gosh, just remember I had to force dx11 because of eve (visual mod, which I uninstalled after) . I T  WORKS !!!!!! Thank you very much lads

On 8/7/2018 at 2:04 PM, Skullcrash said:

My gosh, just remember I had to force dx11 because of eve (visual mod, which I uninstalled after) . I T  WORKS !!!!!! Thank you very much lads

There is a fix for using DX11....there is a file you can download to fix it somewhere but the top half of the first row is still cut off with the fix.

Using -force-glcore or -force-opengl will usually have a similar effect to forcing directx 11, but doesn't require you to find the fix I spoke of...
I cannot believe this issue hasn't been fixed in the past four versions.

On 8/20/2018 at 8:26 PM, slaintemaith said:

I cannot believe this issue hasn't been fixed in the past four versions.

Believe it....

I can't believe how many mods will work with either directx11 or opengl, but not both....

Like some mods work with one but not the other....so you have to pick and choose what you can use and still have everything work.

Not having the parts show up with directx 11 at this point is beyond riduculous....especially since directx 9 is on it's way out....

Pretty much every major gaming developer is ending support for DX9 this year or has already....

Edited August 23, 2018 by JoE Smash
Hanger [sic] Extender fixes the issue when you make the VAB/SPH go away.  It's a workaround that doesn't make any sense, but a workaround nonetheless.
